exampleSentence: A* will* is a legal document with a person's last wishes after their death.
exampleSentenceMeaning: *צוואה* היא מסמך משפטי עם בקשותיו האחרונות של אדם לאחר מותו.

exampleSentence: I don't know if I can do it, but I'm *willing* to give it a chance.
exampleSentenceMeaning: אני לא יודע אם אני אצליח, אבל אני *מוכן* לתת לזה צ'אנס.

exampleSentenceMeaning: אלברט איינשטיין *זכה* בפרס נובל בשנת 1922.

exampleSentence: The weather today was cloudy with strong *winds*.
exampleSentenceMeaning: מזג האוויר היום היה מעונן עם *רוחות* חזקים.

exampleSentence: Can you please close the *window*? it's cold outside.
exampleSentenceMeaning: אתה יכול בבקשה לסגור את ה*חלון*? קר בחוץ.

exampleSentence: I like to drink a glass of red *wine* every now and then.
exampleSentenceMeaning: אני אוהב לשתות כוס *יין* אדום מדי פעם.

exampleSentence: Only animals with *wings* can fly.

exampleSentence: *Winter* is the coldest season of the year.

exampleSentence: I always listen to her advice because she's so full of *wisdom*.

exampleSentence: He's a *wise* man, makes good decisions based on deep understanding and experience.

exampleSentence: Happy birthday! Blow out the candles and make a *wish*.

exampleSentence: John is very *witty*, he uses his words in a clever and funny way.
exampleSentenceMeaning: ג'ון מאוד *שנון*, הוא משתמש במילים שלו בצורה חכמה ומצחיקה.

exampleSentence: Most people like to shower *with* hot water.
exampleSentenceMeaning: רוב האנשים אוהבים להתקלח *עם* מים חמים.

exampleSentence: He *withdrew* 200 shekels from his bank account.
exampleSentenceMeaning: הוא *משך* 200 שקלים מחשבון הבנק שלו.

exampleSentence: The beaten army decided to *withdraw* from the battlefield.

exampleSentence: You will receive your package *within* 7 business days.

exampleSentence: No animal can live *without* water.

exampleSentence: The *witness* saw the criminal stealing the money and running away.

exampleSentence: My mother is a wonderful *woman*!

exampleSentence: He couldn't help but *wonder* what was inside the mysterious box.

exampleSentence: The table and the closet in my room are made of *wood*.

exampleSentence: Yesterday, we went for a hike in the *woods*.

exampleSentence: This sweater is made from sheep *wool*.

exampleSentence: A dictionary can both translate and define the meaning of *words*.

exampleSentence: He *works* as a doctor at a hospital.

exampleSentence: I joined a cooking *workshop* to improve my culinary skills.

exampleSentence: I like travelling to other countries around the *world*.

exampleSentence: A book*worm* is someone who reads a lot of books.

exampleSentence: I've *worn* this shirt many times because I like it.

exampleSentenceMeaning: אם פיצה נחתכת ל-8 חתיכות, 4 חתיכות *יהיו* 50 אחוז מהפיצה.

exampleSentence: My dad built a treehouse in the back*yard*.

exampleSentence: People usually *yawn* when they're tired or bored.

exampleSentence: I celebrate my birthday every *year*.

exampleSentence: A birthday is an *yearly* occasion; it happens every year.

exampleSentence: I can hear you, you don't need to *yell*.

exampleSentence: The color of a ripe banana is *yellow*.

exampleSentence: *Yesterday* is the day before today.

exampleSentence: My package is not here *yet*, it was supposed to arrive yesterday.

exampleSentence: We argue a lot, *yet* we're actually good friends.
exampleSentenceMeaning: אנחנו מתווכחים הרבה, *אבל* אנחנו למעשה חברים טובים.

exampleSentenceMeaning: בממוצע, עצי-תפוח *מניבים* כ-85 קילוגרמים של תפוחים בשנה.

exampleSentenceMeaning: בישראל, *צעירים* מתחת לגיל 18 נחשבים קטינים.

exampleSentence: In her *youth*, she was a tennis player.
exampleSentenceMeaning: ב*צעירותה*, היא הייתה שחקנית טניס.

exampleSentence: The number million has 6 *zeros*.

exampleSentence: Time *zones* are different areas in world with the same time and date.

exampleSentence: An *abstract* painting has no real objects, it focuses on colors and shapes.

exampleSentence: He needs to *administrate* the entire project carefully.

exampleSentence: After lunch, we went* back* to the office to finish the work.
exampleSentenceMeaning: אחרי ארוחת הצהריים, חזרנו *בחזרה* למשרד כדי לסיים את העבודה.

exampleSentence: His *back* hurt after lifting heavy boxes all day.

exampleSentence: They tried to *bargain* for a better price at the market.

exampleSentence: *Barley* is used to make bread and other food products.

exampleSentence: He had a *bout* of coughing due to a cold.

exampleSentence: The ball fell into the *basket* during the game.

exampleSentence: His *belligerent* attitude caused many arguments.

exampleSentence: I like to *browse* through books in the library.

exampleSentence: The garden received *copious* amounts of rain last week.

exampleSentence: This *district* is known for its beautiful parks.

exampleSentence: The colorful sign was meant to *entice* customers into the store.

exampleSentence: A fair judge shows *equity* in his decisions.

exampleSentence: Our *flight* to Paris leaves early tomorrow morning.

exampleSentence: The dark clouds *forebode* an upcoming storm.

exampleSentence: Her dance was filled with *grace* and elegance.

exampleSentence: The cows *graze* peacefully in the field.

exampleSentence: His *hypocrisy* was obvious when he said one thing but did another.

exampleSentence: He *advertently* chose the harder path to learn more.

exampleSentence: The knight showed great *prowess* in battle.

exampleSentence: He is always *serious* when talking about his job.

exampleSentence: The loud noise caused the glass to *shatter* into pieces.
exampleSentenceMeaning: הרעש החזק גרם לזכוכית *להתנפץ* לחתיכות.

exampleSentence: The large *manor* was surrounded by beautiful gardens.

exampleSentence: The cows were grazing in the green *meadow*.

exampleSentence: The *predecessor* of this phone model was also very popular.

exampleSentence: The government decided to *repeal* the old law.

exampleSentence: The big dog tried to *intimidate* the smaller ones.

exampleSentence: He would *rather* read books than watch TV.

exampleSentence: He is well-*versed* in the history of the region.
exampleSentenceMeaning: הוא *בקיא* מאוד בהיסטוריה של האזור.

exampleSentence: She loves reading, and she *also* enjoys writing stories.
exampleSentenceMeaning: היא אוהבת לקרוא, והיא *גם* נהנית לכתוב סיפורים.

exampleSentence: I saw an *ant* on the the kitchen floor this morning.
exampleSentenceMeaning: ראיתי *נמלה* על רצפת המטבח הבוקר.

exampleSentence: The farmer was excited to see a healthy *calf* born on his farm.
exampleSentenceMeaning: החקלאי התרגש לראות *עגל* בריא שנולד בחווה שלו.

exampleSentence: Make sure to *stow* your valuables in a safe place while traveling.
exampleSentenceMeaning: הקפד *לאחסן* את חפצי הערך שלך במקום בטוח בזמן הנסיעה.

exampleSentence: His sudden disappearance was *inexplicable* to everyone.
exampleSentenceMeaning: היעלמותו הפתאומית הייתה *בלתי מוסברת* לכולם.

exampleSentence: The doctor noticed a *tremor* in the patient’s hand during the examination.
exampleSentenceMeaning: הרופא הבחין ב*רעד* ביד של המטופל במהלך הבדיקה.

exampleSentence: The village had a *sparse* population, with only a few families living there.
exampleSentenceMeaning: בכפר הייתה אוכלוסייה *דלילה*, וגרו בו רק משפחות בודדות.

exampleSentence: The *feud* over land ownership caused tension in the small town.
exampleSentenceMeaning: ה*סכסוך* על בעלות הקרקע גרם למתיחות בעיירה הקטנה.

exampleSentence: He went through *rigorous* training before starting the job.
exampleSentenceMeaning: הוא עבר הכשרה *קפדנית* לפני שקיבל את העבודה.

exampleSentence: Freedom of speech is a key *tenet* of democracy.
exampleSentenceMeaning: חופש הביטוי הוא *עיקרון* מרכזי בדמוקרטיה.

exampleSentence: He used a *razor* to shave his beard.
exampleSentenceMeaning: הוא השתמש ב*סכין גילוח* כדי לגלח את זקנו.

exampleSentence: The athlete’s impressive *stature* made him stand out on the basketball court.
exampleSentenceMeaning: *קומתו* המרשימה של הספורטאי גרמה לו לבלוט על מגרש הכדורסל.

exampleSentence: The hero chose to forgive as he realized that *revenge* isn't good.
exampleSentenceMeaning: הגיבור בחר לסלוח כי הבין ש*נקמה* לא מועילה.

exampleSentence: The *president* met with other world leaders to discuss important issues.
exampleSentenceMeaning: ה*נשיא* נפגש עם מנהיגים אחרים בעולם כדי לדון בנושאים חשובים.

exampleSentence: If you break the rules, you may *forfeit* your chance to continue playing.
exampleSentenceMeaning: אם תפר את הכללים, אתה עלול *להפסיד* את ההזדמנות שלך להמשיך לשחק.

exampleSentence: Both parents agreed on joint *custody*.
exampleSentenceMeaning: שני ההורים הסכימו על *משמורת* משותפת.

exampleSentence: There are about 5000 *grains* of salt in a teaspoon.
exampleSentenceMeaning: יש בערך 5000 *גרגרי* מלח בכפית אחת.

exampleSentence: During the *stakeout*, the police watched the house for hours without moving.
exampleSentenceMeaning: במהלך ה*מארב*, המשטרה התבוננה בבית במשך שעות בלי לזוז.

exampleSentence: His *vehement* objection to the plan surprised everyone in the meeting.
exampleSentenceMeaning: התנגדותו ה*תקיפה* לתוכנית הפתיעה את כולם בפגישה.

exampleSentence: The heat caused the metal to *dilate* slightly, expanding its size.
exampleSentenceMeaning: החום גרם למתכת *להתרחב* מעט, והרחיב את גודלה.

exampleSentence: She *redeemed* her gift card at the store and bought a new book.
exampleSentenceMeaning: היא *מימשה* את שובר המתנה שלה בחנות וקנתה ספר חדש.

exampleSentence: The frog made a giant *leap* across the pond.
exampleSentenceMeaning: הצפרדע ביצעה *זינוק* ענק על פני הביצה.

exampleSentence: She was in a *quandary* about whether to accept the job or not.
exampleSentenceMeaning: היא הייתה ב*התלבטות* אם לקבל את התפקיד או לא.

exampleSentence: I’d prefer to stay home *rather* than go out tonight.
exampleSentenceMeaning: אני מעדיף להישאר בבית *ולא* לצאת הלילה.

exampleSentence: She moved to a quiet *county* outside the busy city.
exampleSentenceMeaning: היא עברה ל*מחוז* שקט מחוץ לעיר ההומה.

exampleSentence: He often *conflates* historical events, dates and details.
exampleSentenceMeaning: לעתים קרובות הוא *מערבב* אירועים היסטוריים, תאריכים ופרטים.

exampleSentence: Laughter brought *creases* to the corners of his eyes as he told the joke.
exampleSentenceMeaning: הצחוק העלה *קמטים* בזוויות עיניו כשסיפר את הבדיחה.

exampleSentence: "I won!" she *exclaimed*, jumping with excitement.
exampleSentenceMeaning: "ניצחתי!" היא *קראה* וקפצה בהתרגשות.

exampleSentence: The archaeologist *exhumed* the remains of the site to discover hidden treasures.
exampleSentenceMeaning: הארכיאולוג *חילץ* את שרידי האתר וגילה אוצרות נסתרים.

exampleSentence: A loud thunder *preceded* the heavy rainstorm.
exampleSentenceMeaning: רעם חזק *קדם* לסופת הגשמים העזה.

exampleSentence: He placed the kettle on the *stove* to make tea.
exampleSentenceMeaning: הוא הניח את הקומקום על ה*כיריים* כדי להכין תה.

exampleSentence: The letter "A" is a *vowel*, commonly used in many words.
exampleSentenceMeaning: האות "A" היא *תנועה*, המשמשת בדרך כלל במילים רבות.

exampleSentence: The organization *rehabilitated* the old building, turning it into a community center.
exampleSentenceMeaning: הארגון *שיקם* את המבנה הישן והפך אותו למרכז קהילתי.

exampleSentence: They used metal beams to *reinforce* the structure of the building.
exampleSentenceMeaning: הם השתמשו בקורות מתכת כדי *לחזק* את מבנה הבניין.

exampleSentence: After being insulted, he chose not to *retaliate* and walked away quietly.
exampleSentenceMeaning: לאחר שנעלב, הוא בחר שלא *להחזיר* והסתלק בשקט.

exampleSentence: His *insidious* plan to undermine the project didn't work.
exampleSentenceMeaning: תוכניתו ה*ערמומית* לחתור תחת הפרוייקט לא צלחה.

exampleSentence: Too much caffeine can *induce* insomnia and keep you awake at night.
exampleSentenceMeaning: יותר מדי קפאין יכול *לגרום* לנדודי שינה ולהשאיר אותך ער בלילה.
